items.sentence: I really want to know why he did that kind of thing.
We\'re here to make sure that doesn\'t happen again.
We\'ve gotten some complaints about Tom\'s behavior.
Let\'s make clear which is right and which is wrong.
Maybe we should tell Tom that he\'s being obnoxious.
I have no idea what we\'re supposed to be doing now.
I knew that Tom wouldn\'t have any fun at the party.
I told Tom the reason why I wouldn\'t be able to go.
I\'m having a hard time believing that Tom did that.
This time tomorrow I\'ll be studying in the library.
